backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining user profiles, trade analysis types, access control, and CRUD-style queries for profiles and analyses.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-to-file mapping describing implemented frontend features, components, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference list of concise summaries for many frontend files, used as build documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme configuration defining light and dark mode CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point bootstrapping the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component setting up theming and rendering AppShell with AnalysisDashboard.
frontend/src/components/asset/AssetPicke: Radio-based picker letting users choose between EUR/USD OTC and USD/JPY OTC assets.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout with React Query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their profile name.
frontend/src/components/confluence/Confl: UI dashboard showing multi-timeframe confluence signals, confidence, and aligned state indicators.
frontend/src/components/history/Analysis: Displays a scrollable list of past analysis sessions with timestamps, asset info, signal badges, and a button to view details.
frontend/src/components/history/OutcomeC: Provides controls to mark whether a trade was taken and set its outcome as win, loss, or unknown, showing a status badge.
Wraps the app with layout structure including header, footer, authentication display, and background styling.
frontend/src/components/review/ReviewCon: Allows users to review and edit extracted analysis features, showing warnings for low-confidence or missing values before confirmation.
frontend/src/components/risk/RiskPanel.t: Shows account risk settings and calculated metrics such as recommended stake, daily loss, trades remaining, and stop-loss alerts.
frontend/src/components/signal/SignalRes: Displays the generated trading signal with icon, confidence, rationale list, and contributing strategy badges.
frontend/src/components/stats/Performanc: Presents performance metrics like total trades, wins, losses, win rate, and streaks with conditional highlights.
frontend/src/components/timer/CandleTime: Shows a countdown timer to the next candle, optional sound alert, and a progress bar synced to real-time seconds.
frontend/src/components/upload/Screensho: React component for uploading, previewing, validating, clearing, and submitting image screenshots.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, logout, and identity persistence with AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query hooks wrapping backend calls for user profiles and trade analyses, including save/store mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining CSS variables for themes and applying global background and border styles.
frontend/src/lib/confluence/confluenceEn: Computes multi-timeframe confluence by generating signals for S30, M1, and M5 and determining overall alignment.
frontend/src/lib/engine/combinedSignalEn: Generates trading signals by combining momentum and trap-wick strategies with confidence checks and filters.
frontend/src/lib/risk/riskCalculator.ts: Calculates risk metrics including per-trade risk, daily losses, stop-loss status, and remaining trades based on sessions.
Computes win/loss stats, not-taken count, win rate, and streaks from analysis sessions.
frontend/src/lib/vision/extractFromScree: Mocks async screenshot feature extraction and returns predefined indicator and candle data.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AnalysisDashboard.tsx: Main dashboard managing screenshot upload, feature extraction, signal generation, history, and UI flow.
frontend/src/state/historyStore.ts: Zustand store persisting and managing up to 20 recent analysis sessions.
frontend/src/state/settingsStore.ts: Zustand store persisting user settings like balance, stop loss, and sound preferences.
frontend/src/types/analysis.ts: Defines types for extracted features, signals, confluence, and analysis sessions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for retrieving, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, requirements, and image assets.
